sentence: Who teaches courses that fulfill a CS-LSA program requirement ?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT INSTRUCTORalias0.NAME FROM INSTRUCTOR AS INSTRUCTORalias0 INNER JOIN OFFERING_INSTRUCTOR AS OFFERING_INSTRUCTORalias0 ON OFFERING_INSTRUCTORalias0.INSTRUCTOR_ID = INSTRUCTORalias0.INSTRUCTOR_ID INNER JOIN COURSE_OFFERING AS COURSE_OFFERINGalias0 ON OFFERING_INSTRUCTORalias0.OFFERING_ID = COURSE_OFFERINGalias0.OFFERING_ID INNER JOIN PROGRAM_COURSE AS PROGRAM_COURSEalias0 ON PROGRAM_COURSEalias0.COURSE_ID = COURSE_OFFERINGalias0.COURSE_ID INNER JOIN PROGRAM AS PROGRAMalias0 ON PROGRAMalias0.PROGRAM_ID = PROGRAM_COURSEalias0.PROGRAM_ID WHERE PROGRAMalias0.NAME LIKE "CS-LSA" ;
